name: Des Chiffres et des Lettres
overview: Based on a French television program, this puzzle\brain game was created by Alain Nuttens. Is it necessary to explain to you the rule of this game, which can be played alone or in pairs, without having to wait until 6:50 p.m. for the show to come on! And what television it is, for nearly 20 years the show has been on, and it just continues to grow on ANTENNE 2. Just know that this program will allow you to play when training if you want to participate in the show! Choose vowels or consonants, and while the computer is running the timer, find the longest word. (If you want the computer to give you a solution in the Letters game as well, there are File Floppy Disks compatible with this program). And here are the numbers: be careful, don't make any mistakes when explaining your calculation, or your points will be given to the opponent. Whether you did not find it, the computer will give you the correct answer: the account is good”. A perfect tool to become a crack player (For all ages).
